Package org.svvrl.goal.cmd

Class Script

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.cmd.Script
public class Script
extends java.lang.Object
A script contains procedures and a body of statements. A script is not aware of environment variables and input variables. Such variables should be added the context before evaluating a script.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Script()
    Constructs this script with no procedure defined and with an empty body.
